block.title: Welcome to the Google Apps For Splunk App
block.text: To Authorize your instance of Splunk with Google Apps - please visit the Authorize Splunk dashboard after you click Save.

block.title: Data Inputs
block.text: These are the valid report keys: report:all, report:login, report:drive, report:token, report:calendar, report:admin

block.title: Lookups
block.text:
Located in the $APP_HOME/lookups folder, you can add two files. These files will allow you to specify allowed admins and allowed IP addresses that can make changes within the Control Panel.
gapps_allowed_admins is a KV Store lookup that holds the admin emails and domains.
gapps_allowed_ips.csv is a KV Store lookup that holds the allowed IPs for the domain.

block.title: Problems, Questions, Feedback?
block.text:
If your Modular Input is not working correctly, you can run a search that might help you figure out the issue. "index=_internal sourcetype=splunkd googleapps" will give you the logging outputs for this App.

If you have any problems or questions, you can email me. Happy Splunking and hunting!
